articles.author: Yen Nee Lee
articles.title: Rising energy prices will squeeze company profits, says business consultant - CNBC
articles.description: U.S. firms have a better chance at protecting their margins thanks to a "very buoyant" consumer market, said Richard Martin, managing director of IMA Asia.
articles.content:
Rising energy prices will increase business costs and narrow profit margins of companies around the world, a management consultant said Wednesday.
Prices of energy commodities including oil, natural… [+1073 chars]

articles.title: Singapore teen who did backflip in rhino enclosure allegedly consumed cannabis while out on bail - The Star Online
articles.description: SINGAPORE (The Straits Times/Asia News Network): A youth who was caught on video last December doing a backflip inside a white rhinoceros enclosure at the Singapore Zoo allegedly consumed cannabis while he was out on bail.

articles.title: Q&A: Lenovo Asia Pacific president on consumer electronic trends - Rappler
articles.description: Lenovo's Amar Babu tells us how consumer trends shifted during the pandemic, and how he sees them evolving as more people get vaccinated
articles.content: In the past, accessories such as a good headset, microphone and laptop stands were seen as luxuries. Today, they are considered necessities in the online office and classroom. Midstream to higher end… [+213 chars]
